about_the_game:
Skybound: Only Up Parkour VR is an exhilarating parkour challenge designed to push your movement skills to the limit — all while racing against the clock. Navigate through intricate courses filled with obstacles, gaps, and towering structures. Every leap, climb, and jump tests your agility and precision, with the added thrill of completing each course in the fastest time possible.

In Skybound: Only Up Parkour VR, mastering the art of movement is key. Fine-tune your skills while racing to beat the timer. Whether you're climbing, jumping across gaps, or navigating complex obstacles, every action demands perfect timing, concentration, and speed.

Get ready for an action-packed adventure that will consume you as you rise higher and higher. Conquer daunting obstacles, scale dizzying heights, and experience the rush of parkour like never before. Your goal: push your limits and conquer the challenge. Your reward: unforgettable thrills and a sense of accomplishment.

The movement mechanics in Skybound: Only Up Parkour VR continually challenge your reflexes and decision-making, rewarding precision and speed. Player feedback will be crucial in refining the game, ensuring a responsive and evolving experience.

Future updates will bring multiplayer features, competitive challenges, and more, so stay tuned as we continue to enhance this one-of-a-kind VR experience.

Ready to dive in? The clock is ticking — don’t miss your chance to conquer the sky!

name: Skybound Only Up VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, HTC Vive, HTC Vive controllers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, HTC Vive, HTC Vive controllers.

short_description: Get ready for an epic VR adventure! Jump, climb, and conquer towering obstacles in a world of thrilling challenges. Master movement, reach new heights, and feel the rush. Your goal: overcome the challenge. Your reward: unforgettable thrills. A one-of-a-kind VR experience awaits—dive in!
